edge: Shreyas Talpade portrays the character of Iqbal Saeed Khan in this movie.
Shweta Basu Prasad plays the role of Khadija Saeed Khan, who is younger sister of Iqbal Saeed Khan.
Naseeruddin Shah enacts the character named Mohit Mishra in this movie.
Girish Karnad essays the role of Guruji in this film.
Yatin Karyekar depicts the character Anwar Saeed Khan in this movie.
Prateeksha Lonkar portrays the character Saida Saeed Khan in this movie.
Dilip Salgaonkar plays the role named Bipin in this film.
Jyoti Joshi acts as Farida in this movie.
Adarsh Balakrishna depicts the character named Kamal in this movie.
Gururaj Manepalli portrays the role of Akash in this film.
D. Santosh plays the character named Satish Bhatawdekar in this movie.
Cricket legend Kapil Dev makes a special appearance in this film and plays himself.
